snippet: Princess Srirasm, mother of a presumed heir to the Thai throne, lost her title after the recent arrests of her relatives and amid King Bhumibol Adulyadej’s health problems.
abstract: Princess Srirasm of Thailand, mother of a presumed heir to the Thai throne, has requested permission to give up her royal title.
lead_paragraph: Princess Srirasm, mother of a presumed heir to the Thai throne, lost her title after the recent arrests of her relatives and amid King Bhumibol Adulyadej’s health problems.

headline.main: Thai Princess, Queen-to-Be, Gives Up Title
headline.print_headline: Thai Princess, Queen-to-Be, Gives Up Title
